"PMD" is a common abbreviation for [id://1040|PerlMonks Discussion], the section for discussing the PerlMonks site itself (see also [id://89535]). A form for starting a new discussion about the site can be found at the [href://?node_id=1040#post|bottom] of that page (but please review [id://483077] first).

Major changes to the site will be announced in the [id://1040|PMD] section though it will also contain other threads such as questions about the site. Minor (and major) changes to the site are recorded in [Tidings].

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
